mapper.select: SELECT klc.luckDrawCount FROM klg_customer_level kcl LEFT JOIN klg_level_config klc ON kcl.levelId = klc.id WHERE kcl.customerId = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT COUNT(kpc.id) FROM klg_prizedraw_lssue kpl LEFT JOIN klg_prizedraw_customer kpc ON kpl.issueNumber = kpc.issueNumber WHERE kpl.`status` = 2 AND kpc.customerId = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM klg_buy_transaction WHERE YEARWEEK( date_format(created, '%Y-%m-%d'), 1 ) = YEARWEEK(now(), 1) AND customerId = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
